about_the_game:
Fuck in police 🔞 is a game with a lot of sex.

Imagine, you are in the police station. All police officers were tired of the day routine, crimes and criminals and decided to get some pleasure. They took off their uniforms and started fucking directly on their working places. All rooms, offices and prison cells can be opened and available for exploration. You can check them one by one and see what exactly police officers are doing there instead of work. This police station will surprise you on every corner. You will enjoy exploring it! You can interact with objects, switch On or Off the light, open or close doors etc.

The police station has 9 rooms, including 3 prison cells, each room contain something interesting and, of course, erotic. In every room you will see fucking police couples or trios or even something more interesting. You can find fucking scenes on each step, and in some rooms, you can easily join sex act. Main character has different options how to enjoy sex acts with NPC and it depends only on your imagination how you will do it.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant game play, unlocking sexually enticing interactions that reveal the profound aspects of the characters' relationships. The gaming experience will be filled with incredibly seductive visual effects, realistic sounds, and detailed characters, making the game even more appealing.

You will see:
- Masturbation
- Hand job
- Blowjob
- Vaginal Sex
- Anal Sex
…even more to explore!
This game does not have any boring story, it is just fuck, fuck, fuck!

In this game you will never lose, you will not get the message "Game over!" The only thing which you may see is orgasm at the end of the sex act.

So, discover this cool Sex motel and don't stop until you check all its rooms!

Good luck!

content_descriptors.notes: In this game the characters are naked and are having sex in each room.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: 12 Core CPU 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 or AMD Radeon 6000 At last 8 Gb of the VRAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
